items.name: Patchwork
items.body:
A relaxing two-player game that takes about 15â€“20 minutes. Players use buttons to buy Tetris-style fabric patches and place them on their personal quilt board. Each patch takes time to add, and players must balance time, shape, and cost to create the most complete and efficient quilt.
â™Ÿï¸[url=https://boardgamearena.com/gamepanel?game=patchwork]Learn and play Patchwork on Board Game Arena[/url]

[b]Complexity:[/b] Medium
[b]Play Time: [/b]Short (15 mins)

A quick and quirky card game where players try to get rid of all their cards without getting stuck with high-scoring Llamas. Itâ€™s simple, silly, and surprisingly strategic.

items.name: No Thanks!

A minimalist classic: take a card or pay a chip to say â€œNo thanks!â€ The twist? Cards you collect score against you â€” unless you can build runs. Quick, tense, and deceptively clever.

items.name: Century: Spice Road
